doc:
Conchata Ferrell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conchata_Ferrell 0 Conchata Galen Ferrell (born March 28, 1943) is an American character actress. Although she has been a regular castmember of five TV sitcom series, she is best known for her lengthy tenure playing Berta the housekeeper for all 12 seasons of the CBS sitcom Two and a Half Men. For her performances, she received two Primetime Emmy Award nominations (in 2005 and 2007). Conchata_Galen_Ferrell ( born March_28_,_1943 ) is an_American_character_actress . Although she has_been a_regular_castmember of five_TV_sitcom_series , she is_best_known for her_lengthy_tenure playing Berta the_housekeeper for all_12_seasons of the_CBS_sitcom Two and a_Half_Men . For her_performances , she received two_Primetime_Emmy_Award_nominations ( in 2005_and_2007_) .
